name: unfathomably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is impossible to understand: We are just a speck in an unfathomably large universe. He lost his job in circumstances that remain unfathomably mysterious. See
unfathomable
More examplesFewer examplesA way of life that should be simple is made unfathomably complex because of economic hardship.The country's power company unfathomably ran out of electricity.She sings powerful songs of strength and desire with an unfathomably sorrowful voice.
